title: The Podium: Get Ready for the Games
description: Get ready for the 2018 Winter Olympics with NBC Sports and Vox Media. All this month, The Podium will introduce you to athletes to watch in the lead up to PyeongChang in February.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
